Reason: The configuration option 'slow_query_log_timeout_in_ms' in the Cassandra software project is performance-sensitive because changing its value can significantly impact the system's performance. A lower timeout value may result in more frequent logging of slow queries, increasing the overhead on the system and potentially affecting its overall performance. On the other hand, a higher timeout value may delay the logging of slow queries, which could impact the system's ability to identify and address performance bottlenecks in a timely manner.
